info.name: barnard59-rdf
info.description: RDF support for Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: Map (RDF/JS Quad)
operations.comment: Calls a map function only for quads matching the given triple pattern.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/mapMatch.js#default>
].

operations.label: build Cube Shape
operations.comment: Builds a Cube Shape based on Cube Observation datasets
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/cube.js#buildCubeShape>
].

operations.label: to Cube Observation
operations.comment: Converts a set of quads to a Cube Observation
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/cube.js#toObservation>
].

operations.label: Set Graph
operations.comment: Sets the graph of all quads to the given fixed value.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/setGraph.js#default>
].

operations.label: Append metadata
operations.comment: Fetches, updates and appends a metadata resource
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/metadata.js#append>
].

operations.label: Void statistics
operations.comment: Appends void statistics, such as counts for entities and properties
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-rdf/metadata.js#voidStats>
].
